head: cursor/fixing-code-bugs-16bc
title: Daily summary + Game Length; rating change by prior Game ID; incremental rebuild
body:
- Daily sheet: final ratings (Bullet/Blitz/Rapid), per-day totals (games/W/L/D, win %, score), rating sum/change vs prior day, total time; per-format metrics
- Games: Game Length (min) from PGN Start/End (handles midnight wrap; live only)
- Rating Change: per Format vs prior game by smaller Game ID
- Annotate before write; incremental daily rebuild after adding new games

Commit: de16793cd9134817bb629f4388359231ae55666b
